1.content:
Morgan's husband left her for another woman a couple years after her daughter was born. She was left alone with her two children, and he got off without having to pay child support. Her husband and his new wife are allowed to have the children every other weekend. One of the main things that get to her is, the children actually like their stepmom.

Morgan barely makes enough money to pay her bills, and needs extra money. One day, while reading the newspaper she finds an ad that catches her eye. It is asking for a female to come to a laboratory for an experiment. She isn't really interested, until she sees that it pays $5,000. So, she writes down the address and decides to go try the experiment.

So, she calls her babysitter Ashley. She tells her that she is going out for awhile and that the kids will be there in about an hour. Ashley says she will watch them, and she will be there in a few minutes. Morgan tells her that will be fine, and heads out to her car. She follows the directions and soon arrives at a large two story building. The name on the front of the building is Geotech, Inc., and it looks like a normal building.

So, she got out of the car and went inside. Once inside, she saw a receptionist. The receptionist asked if she could help her, and she mentioned the newspaper ad. The receptionist told her to have a seat, and she would let them know she was there. Morgan was given a form to fill out and then was sent to a waiting area. She sits and reads a magazine for about 15 minutes, and two people come up to her.

The two people before her were a man and a woman. They looked to be slightly older than her and were wearing white lab coats. The two of them introduced themselves to Morgan, they were Dr. John White and Dr. Mary Parker. Morgan introduced herself and then she was taken to a room somewhere towards the back of the building. She is given a short physical, and the two doctors come back in. They explain that she is a great subject.

The explanation that Morgan is given is a little too complicated for her. She is told that the experiment is meant to reduce the mass of an object, thereby making it easier to move heavy objects. They explain that the way that this will be done is by firing a laser at her for a few seconds. They assure her that there is nothing that will happen to her. So, she agrees to do the experiment. Just to be safe, the doctors get her to sign a liability form, stating that they can't be held responsible for any adverse effects.

So, they are now ready to do the procedure.

After what seemed like an eternity Ashley stopped and put Morgan down. Light headed from Ashley's dirty sock smell, she sat down on the matress, mauling over what just happened. But this didn't last long as something large and gray went over Morgan and trapped her. It didn't take her long to realize that it was Ashley's once white socks over her, the smell gave it away. Then Morgan was swung around and around in the dirty sock before Ashley peeked in. "How is it in there?" she asked mockingly. "Now you know what it feels like when I'm in here and have to smell your socks!" It was true, Morgan being a divorced Mom, hadn't much time to herself anymore. She hadn't the time to get pedicures, wash her feet or even change her socks much. When she did change them they old, smelly ones were left on the bed or the dresser. Ashley ceased this torture long enough for Morgan to shout; "Let me ouy of here Ashley, I'm sorry I cut back on your pay!" "Too late for that Morgan, now you'll have to pay without money!" Morgan didn't know what this meant, but she soon felt something damp and fleshy going inside the sock. Ashley was putting her foot back in it, to crush Morgan! Morgan gasped for air as Ashley wiggle her toes around and forced Morgan all around the dirty sock with them. This ender when she pulled Morgan out of her sock with her hand and tossed her into one of her shoes. Ashley then stepped into her shoes and Morgan felt a load of pressure on her entire body. Not only that, but the smell was intensified as she was in the source of the stench. Ashley slipped her foot in and out of the shoe repeatedly for what seemed like ages and then Morgan heard footsteps in the hallway. "Mommy?" a little girl called. It was Morgans daughter Hannah. Ashley quicked ended this cerade and slipped her shoe back on. Morgan's screams were muffled by Ashley's smelly foot and the fact Morgan barely had enough air to bearthe. "Where's mom at?" Hannah asked sweetly. Ashley replied "Oh, I don't know I was looking for Morgan too, she cut back on my pay again." "What were you doing in here?" Hannah asked inquisitively. "Oh, just airing out my feet a little before I leave, I don't much time ot do it I've been so busy." "Eww," said Hannah, "you feet stink!" Ashley let out a giggle, and replied "You're not the only one who knows that." When she sead this she found Morgan in her shoe and squeezed her between her socked toes, forceing the odor into Morgan's lungs. Hannah giggled with her and said "Well, my feet stink too, see?" as she took off one of her shoes and wafted the stench to Ashley. "Woah!" Ashley said, taken aback by the intensity of the 8 year old girl's foot odor. "Anyways, go try to find your mommy, I need to call for a ride."

Ashley took her shoe off and looked inside at Morgan. "Enjoying the smell in there? That's gonna be your home for a while, until I feel I'm paid off what you cut from my pay." Morgan was finally able to think, despite still being light headed from the foot stench and the lack of air at some points. How could Ashley be this cruel? She hoped she acted the opposite to her children. There was no escape from her new smelly prison, the only thing she had to wait for was for Ashley to take her shoes off.
After Morgan heard Ashley walk into her house from inside the smelly shoe, Ashley told Morgan...

11222.content:
"Mommy!" a shrill, loud, familiar voice called from the other side of the enormous door, so far away. It was Hannah, Morgan's 8 year old daughter. For a moment Morgan almost felt a rush of relief - it was her sweet little girl on the other side of that door, how could she be afraid of her, no matter her size?

BOOM! BOOM! went the door as she beat on it another few times, sending Morgan's heart pounding again. "Mommy!!! ASHLEY went hooome!" she whined, with a bratty tone in her voice. "Come on Mommy, get up already! You've been ignoring me all day!" she screamed, hitting the door again hard, one last time.

Morgan watched, frozen on the center of the bed, as the giant doorknob across the room started to turn. The next thing she saw was her daughter walking in the door... She was so huge! Her beautiful brown hair dangled to and fro, and her huge blue eyes were scanning the room, looking for any sign of her mother.

"MOM, can I be ungrounded already!!!?" she bellowed. It hurt Morgan's ears. "Ugh, she must not be in here. Where is she?" Hannah continued, scanning the room one last time. She turned and started for the door.

"HONEY!" Morgan screamed, running toward her giant daughter on the mattress. "HANNAH! I'M DOWN HERE!" she screamed again, as loud she could toward the familiar giantess. Hannah turned.

"What was that-?" Hannah said. "Mom, are you in here?" Her eyes scanned the room, in the direction of the tiny voice she heard. Suddenly she gasped, her big blue eyes becoming wide with disbelief. For a moment she refused to believe what was in front of her, and she just stood there.

"Sweetie it's okay, it's really me, Mommy!" Morgan cried, holding up her arms to her giant daughter. "That experiment I went to, they shrunk me!!!" she screamed.

Hannah just stared at her, her head tilting awkwardly to one sided. "Woah..." she simply said, but it was the first sign of her accepting what was in front of her. "They... um... they... shrunk you...?" She continued, starting to walk closer. Her giant eyes were so huge, as she leaned forward.

Hannah's giant locks of brown hair dangled over her as her daughter brought her knees up on the bed. Her giant daughter's weight impacting the matress was enough to knock her on her back, where she just laid as Hannah manuevered over her mother, sitting crosslegged around her. "Mom...?" she said, in a bit of a daze. After a moment, her expression changed. "This is... cooool!" Hannah grinned down, her eyes wide, as her tiny mother looked up at her on her back. Hannah's huge grinning face loomed over her.

Her giant fingers began to reach for her, and Morgan began flailing, trying to push her daughter's giant hand away. "Wait!!!" Morgan screamed, as her giant daughter's fingers clasped around her, gripping her, squeezing far too hard before Morgan could even instruct the giantess 8-year-old otherwise. The air was depressed from her lungs, and she stuggled to inhale or speak as she was held her up to her daughter's huge, pretty, grinning face and wide blue eyes. Hannah squinted her giant eyes, and tilted her huge head as though she was thinking.

"Can I be ungrounded, Mommy?" she eventually asked, smirking evilly at her tiny mother, suddenly so tiny and helpless in her hand. She eventually noticed that her mother was desperately wiggling and pushing against her fingers, so she relaxed her grip a bit. Color rushed back into her mom's face.

"Hannah!!" a tiny, exasperated Morgan yelled in anger. "You're STILL completely grounded, that's not changing at all young lady!!" she yelled up into the grinning face of her pretty daughter. She immediately regretted saying it as the grin on Hannah's face disappeared, and she found herself suddenly falling, quickly landing on the bed with a plop, surrounded by her daughter's legs..

"STEPHANIE said you were stupid for grounding me for bad grades anyway," Hannah spat down, angrilly. "She's a LOT better mommy than you, so you should LISTEN to her," she continued, her pretty blue eyes narrowing in anger and superiority.

"SHUT UP! Just shut up!!!" Morgan yelled up at her giant, pretty daughter's angry face, tears welling up in her eyes. She tried to stand up, but she was flicked in the head before she knew what happened. She saw a flash, and found herself face down on the mattress, dizzy.

"I don't want you to be my mommy anymore," Hannah spat down, still angry. "So I'm gonna try being YOUR mommy now, and for being so mean, I'M grounding you for a whole month!" she started to giggle.

"Ugh... do you think I care, Hannah!!" Morgan screamed up at her gigantic brat of a daughter. "I'm already the size of a bug, you can't make it any worse!"

The next sound Morgan heard was hard to place for a moment - SCREEP! SCREEP! But then it hit her what she'd just heard... Her giant daughter was pulling up the velcro straps on her expensive purple sketchers... the ones that Stephenie, her stepmom had gotten her for christmas.

"Sweetie, Mommy loves you, don't do anything to her!!" Morgan began to beg.

"Smelly feet for MOMMY!" She giggled down, as she scooted back a bit. The next thing Morgan knew, her daughter's perfect soles were hovering over her tiny body, and she was unable to do anything but lay there as her daughter's soft, stinky, gigantic soles covered her from head to toe.

She tried to hold her breath, but she was stuck under the giant feet too long and began hurting for some air. She inhaled... it smelled just like she expected, like the sweaty sneakers they had been incased in. She realized that all she could do was smell Hannah's feet, and all she could think about was how the smell was coming from the sneakers that her stepmom had gotten for her.

"Mmmfff!" she screamed in frustration, unable to move or budge from under the fleshy soles off of her pretty daughter. Hannah responded by giggling and pressing down harder into the mattress. "Mmmmmfffff!" she screamed again, to no avail. Soon her daughter's feet had slid down, down her tiny body until she found herself facing her pretty daughter's smelly, stinky toes.

Hannah looked down and saw her mother's face, peering up at her from between her smelly toes. "Hah Hah! Smell my toes mommy, you're grounded!" She mocked, squeezing her mom's head into the flesh of her toes, forcing the smell into her lungs. "This is SO cool," she snickered, watching her mom flail helplessly for some air. "I see why you ground me all the time now, it's fun!"

"Mmmfff..." Morgan again repeated, weakly... she was getting hazy, and she loved her little girl, but now all she wanted was for it to end... but that wasn't gonna happen.

"Okay Mommy, that's enough for now," Hannah giggled, raising her feet off of her.

Morgan lay there gasping for air for a moment, looking up at her daughter's pretty, delighted grinning face, suddenly amazed at how pretty she was getting. "Sweetie, please, don't do anything else to me!" she begged.

"Don't worry Mommy, remember that I still love you, even when I'm squishing you to death under my smelly feet," she grinned down, evilly. "That's just what YOU sound like when you ground me and say YOU still love me," Her giant fingers came down and wrapped around her mother, and brought her to her face. She sniffed her, and giggled. "You smell just like my feet now," she grinned.

"Honey, please please, just help me get big again!" Morgan pleaded.

Hannah grinned...
11222.title: At the Mercy of Hannah

112221.content:
“No way, you're still GROUNDED Mommy,” Hannah grinned, her giant teeth showing in front of her exhausted, tiny mother's face. She slyly smiled as she reached for something behind her mother, and pulled it underneath her. Morgan twisted helplessly, trying to see what she had done.

Before she could say otherwise, Morgan was falling again. THUD! She hit a strange surface, harder than the mattress. She looked around, and as she gasped for air she understood. The sneaker smell, the giant insole and tunnel she saw... she looked up out of the opening up at her daughter's grinning face. She was inside one of Hannah's gigantic purple Sketchers!

“You're never gonna be big again!” Hannah decreed, pausing dramatically. “I'm gonna keep you in my smelly shoes, and STOMP you under my stinky feet forever!” Hannah's pretty blue eyes grew wide, and her brown hair bounced from side to side as she declared her mother a slave to her smelly feet for the rest of her life.

Morgan was in disbelief – how could her own sweet little daughter come up with something so horrible! Sure, she could be a brat, but she wasn't capable of this! “Hannah... please, you can't! I'm your Mommy! You...sweetie please, don't do this to me! ... I'm sorry, please just let Mommy go! ” Morgan cried, but it was too late. The grin on Hannah's pretty face grew as she examined her tiny mother, who peered up at her through the mouth of her shoe.

Hannah's giant toes suddenly appeared overtop of the mouth of the shoe. “I don't need you anymore,” she began to grin. “I have a good mommy now, the one who GOT me these shoes!” she finished. Morgan's stomach lurched as she felt the noose tightening. The mention of Stephanie, her replacement, got her sick to her stomach.

“Sweetie... please!” she gasped. “Don't put on your shoes! Don't turn me into this, I'm your mommy!” Morgan screamed as Hannah's toes began to lower into the mouth of the shoe.

“No you're not, Stephanie's MY mommy! You belong to me!” Hannah laughed. “And you're GONNA live under my feet from now on!” Hannah declared, as she gripped Morgan between her pretty, giant, smelly toes.

Completely overpowered, Morgan was dragged along with them nearly all the way to the back of the smelly purple shoe, hearing Hannah's muffled voice giggling the entire time. About three-fourths of the way there, however, Hannah's toes released her, and her humongous, soft, smelly sole slid over top. Morgan could do nothing... the expensive shoes Stephanie had got her *perfectly* hugged her daughter's smelly foot, shoving her helpless body face up into Hannah's soft, but stinky and repulsive sole as it fully entered the shoe.

SCREEP! SCREEP!... SCREEP!.... SCREEP!

Hannah adjusted the Velcro straps on the the top of her shoes until they were on tight. She swirled around and dangled her feet over the bed, knocking her purple sketchers together. She could feel her mother's helpless body shoved flat into the sole of her right foot, and could feel her mom's arms reaching out in both directions.

“Stupid!” Hannah giggled. "Why did you let them shrink you, now look where you are!" she continued. She scooted down, lowering her feet to the floor. Slowly she began to put more and more of her weight on her feet, until she was standing up all the way. "This is what the rest of your life's gonna be like, stupid!" Hannah laughed.

Morgan was screaming, and seeing stars and flashes of light. If Hannah's feet and the insole of the shoe weren't both so soft, she would've instantly been knocked out by the intense pressure. But she wasn't, it was just horribly crushing. She could hear her beautiful, giant daughter giggling above.

"Take that!" pretty Hannah called down, as she playfully stomped her mother's tiny body under her right foot. "And that!" she continued, laughing.

"Oooh!" Hannah suddenly gasped...

She was pretty good at thinking on her feet. "She told me that she went to the store for some milk and eggs!"

Does Matt believe her?

1122212.content:
“Mommy, I think you just shrunk again!” Hannah laughed. “You feel smaller!” she continued, stomping her foot on the ground a few more times. “Cool!” Hannah laughed, as she walked out of their mother's room, and into the living room with Matt.

“Mom's not in there,” she said to Matt.

“What, did she sneak out?” Matt replied, standing up.

“I dunno, why would I know that?” Hannah replied. She was standing with all her weight on her right foot, occasionally hopping up and down.

“Her car's still out there, she didn't drive anywhere,” Matt continued, as he went in the other room himself. Soon he'd searched every room in the house. “No, she's gone, I don't know where she is.”

“Maybe she ran away on us!” Hannah accused.

“No, she wouldn't do that,” Matt replied. “I don't think she would do that, anyway.”

After calling their dad, and talking to him, they all decided that that was the only option, although the fact that her car was still in the driveway bugged them all. The kids went to their father's house, and were greeted with hugs and kisses by their stepmom Stephanie.

Hannah went to her room, and got on her computer. She slipped off her right shoe and pulled it up to her face, peering inside. Her mother's body was smashed into the insole, but she was still okay and breathing. “HI MOMMY!” she beamed, sticking out her tongue afterwards. Then she put the shoe back on the floor, and stuck her foot back in it.

***

Three whole days went by.

Morgan was in disbelief – she was one inch tall, stuffed in a shoe under the feet of her 8-year-old daughter, and no else one had a clue. Hannah was quite relentless with the teasing; she'd often slip her shoe on, and off, and on, and off, for hours at at time, occasionally peeking inside at her tiny mother's body, smashed into the insole of her favorite purple Sketchers.

Despite the horror of the situation, Morgan was never able to actually start hating her giant daughter, no matter how immensely cruel she was being. She found herself making up excuses for the girl, telling herself that Hannah was just 'rebelling' and that this whole thing would eventually pass.

Morgan had plenty of time to think. Occasionally she wondered why her daughter never wore any socks. She'd never paid attention before... did she just never wear socks, or was she intentionally wearing her shoes barefoot because she thought it'd smell worse? She knew it was strange, but she wished she could at least ask Hannah about it, but Hannah never gave her an opportunity to speak.

On occasion, Hannah would mockingly ask her mother 'how her feet smelled,' or if she 'wanted out,' but she'd never give her tiny mother a chance to speak before laughing and shoving her foot back in the shoe.

Morgan eventually got so hungry that she resorted to licking her daughter's sweaty sole for whatever possible sustainance it could provide. Hannah was absolutely *thrilled* by this, and began mocking her mother for "tasting" her feet.

***

Eventually it became apparent that Morgan was really missing, and hadn't actually ran out on the kids. Morgan heard from underneath her daughter's disgusting smelly sole many conversations, between Hannah and Matt, Stephanie, Mike, and even the police. Morgan was full of hope that she'd finally be out from under the giant eight-year-old's control. Of course, Hannah failed to ever mention that Morgan was being squashed under her sweaty feet the entire time, and after a couple of more weeks, the police gave up their search.

Once word got around, the proprietors of the shrinking experiment eventually came forward, and explained what they believed had happened – that Morgan had shrank down to nothing and that there was really nothing they could do about it. They were not held accountable because Morgan had signed a waiver before beginning the project... of course she had skipped over the fine print, just to get it over with. (They failed to mention that the most the experiment could have possibly shrank her to was an inch tall, but that was hardly their concern, of course.)

By this time Hannah and Matt had moved in permanently with their father and Stephanie, and neither of the children seemed to miss their mother all that much. Morgan got to attend her own funeral, underneath Hannah's stinky feet the whole time, of course. :)

When the family got home from the funeral, Hannah decided to do something new with her tiny mom. She grabbed a piece of bubble gum, and tossed it in her mouth. After a few minutes of chewing, she kicked off her shoes and plucked her mother out of her right sketcher. “Hi Mommy!” she snickered. “You know you're dead now, right?” she teased.

“Sweetie...” Morgan started. “I... I don't...” she tried to continue, but was too weak.

“Shh!” Hannah shushed. She casually pulled the piece of bubble gum out of her mouth and began wrapping it around her mother's tiny body, humming happily as she worked. Soon Morgan was encased in her daughter's chewed bubblegum, from head to toe. “Cool!” she giggled, as she...
1122212.title: Stuck In Hannah's Shoes

choices: Back in her purple sketcher
Into her bookbag for school tommorrow
11222121.content:
“honey no” Morgan managed to squeak out before the finger of her daughter worked the bubblegum over her mouth silencing any hope Morgan had about pleading rationally with her daughter. The next few moments were of the most horrifying in Morgan’s life.
The mouth of her daughter began to open wide; her bright sterling white teeth glistened with saliva as the teeth jutted down like sharp daggers. Morgan tried to scream but the gum was to sticky and any attempt she made to open her mouth just caused the gum which was molded around her to move with her mouth.
Morgan could hear her daughter Hannah giggling triumphantly as she was shoved onto the waiting tongue of her daughter. This sight left Morgan to watch in complete horror as Hannah’s mouth closed shut. A moment passed by and nothing happened, and then Hannah’s now mighty tongue began to push her towards her daughter’s molars. Morgan could only look on as her daughter’s teeth slammed down beside her. The gum was partially ripped from her body as the teeth snapped next to her waist.
Morgan was beside herself as the mouth of her daughter opened wide and then slammed back down onto the gum. Countless times Morgan could remember chastising her daughter for smacking her gum and chewing it with her mouth opened.
“You’re not a horse honey” she would always say but now these impolite habits of her daughter gave her frightening views of the outside world. Morgan could make out glimpses of pictures and her ex husband in between chews.
Hours felt like it had passed with each second containing a terrifying moment when Morgan would wonder if her daughter’s teeth would exterminate her existence, but that moment didn’t come. She was starting to notice that her daughters chewing was becoming more erratic, Morgan could only chalk this up to the fact that Hannah wasn’t paying as close attention to her anymore. The moment of her doom now felt like it was coming closer. As several times Hannah’s teeth have landed squarely on her chest and if not for a few comedic moments in whatever cartoon Hannah was watching she would already be dead.
“Time for dinner” said the voice of the woman you hated more than life itself. The home wrecker called your daughter and son to the dinner table and they obediently obeyed. In fact Hannah hardly whined.
All at once and quite unexpectedly a tremendous pressure swept across your cocooned body. A bright light was everywhere as you left the mouth of your daughter and landed squarely in her hand. Your eyes met hers and you watched a gigantic grin cross her face. You thought for a brief moment that you were going to be discarded into the trash but then you were swept beneath the rim of the plate.
Of course you thought yourself. You remembered countless times you would see your daughter shove her gum onto the underside rim of the plate. In fact you can remember hundreds of occasions you would find these little presents while you were doing the dishes as Hannah had forgotten the gum when she was done eating.
Everything happened so fast, you saw the white rim of the plate closing on you and then a tremendous pressure on your back as you were pressed firmly onto the plate. The next half hour felt torturous to you. You couldn’t see anything, but you had to listen to the banter of life going on without you. Your replacement was asking your children about their school day, and your ex husband about work.
As the meal drew on and on you began to wonder if Hannah had forgotten about you. You heard her excuse herself from the table. You cringed at the thought of Stephanie seeing you and tossing you away like a piece of trash, but a moment later you felt your bubblegum cocoon ripped from the plate as your daughter ran upstairs and closed her door.
“That was so cool mommy, we can definitely do that again.” Your daughter told you as she easily ripped you from the wad of gum.
“This has gone on long enough. Now just take me to your father and..”
“Why would I do that? You are dead remember? The way I figure it, is I own you now slave.”
The words cut through you like a knife. Your own daughter , your flesh and blood called you a slave. This has to be some kind of rebelling against your parents thing. My baby is a not normally like this. She’s a good girl.
You were so busy thinking you didn’t even notice Hannah putting you in….
11222121.title: Bubblegum Hell

choices: She tries to climb down off the bed... to go looking for Matt...
She tries to climb down off the bed... to go looking for an adult...
112221211.content:
Morgan suddenly realized she was being lowered into her old prison, her daughter's giant smelly right sketcher. “Sweetie, please, not again!” she screamed, which only prompted a careless snicker from her gigantic daughter. Soon she was on the purple insole of the giant purple sneaker, struggling to get on her own tiny feet.

“Just give it up mom, you're doomed to smell my feet forever,” Hannah laughed from the outside. She was already standing up, her huge toes were dancing over the mouth of the shoe. Morgan started to cry, as she scurried over to her own indentation in the insole, where the crushing weight of her daughter's body would have the least effect.

Hannah watched as her tiny mother ran into her shoe, and then stuffed her foot inside of it. The now familiar feeling of her mother's weak struggling under her foot was actually comforting. Hannah quickly strapped up her shoes and took a few steps, laughing confidently as she mashed her mom perfectly into place.

Then she left the room to go play outside:

Mike and Stephanie owned a large house with a lot of land around it, out further from the city. Hannah and Matt really liked their new, larger house, but what they both loved was being able to go outside, and play outside, which was never an option when they were living with their mother. Hannah had actually started playing outside quite a bit.

Hannah would usually play for hours with her brother, racing with him, playing tag, basketball, or whatever. Matt was actually starting to get in shape, at least a little. Mike and Stephanie would often join in the fun, they would all throw frisbee or toss a ball around. Morgan's tiny body was constantly being pummeled as she was trampled under her energetic daughter's slick, sweaty barefoot. Morgan often suffered through long periods where there was no air to breathe; it was just part of living under Hannah's feet.

Hannah's playful days went on for three weeks without a hitch; Morgan's pleas for mercy were always laughed at and ignored, and Hannah's love for peeking in her stinky shoe and teasing and mocking her helpless, flattened mother never seemed to end. The family was so perfect – Hannah and Matt got everything they wanted, and Mike and Stephanie seemed to be madly in love. Hannah was high above in heaven, Morgan was down below in a crushing, smelly hell.

Eventually Hannah caught the flu, and started throwing up. While lying in bed she took her tiny, crushed mother and wrapped her up in bubblegum again. She didn't want to give her any breaks, of course, and she was very grouchy and afraid that her tiny mom might somehow crawl out of her shoes while she was stuck in bed and get discovered by someone else in the family. Between bouts of puking, Hannah would eat chicken soup dropped off by her stepmother, and when nobody was around she'd chew on her bubblegum-covered mother.

Morgan was submitted to days of torture, swallowing mouthfuls of her own daughter's chicken soup, bubblegum and vomit flavored spit, and being mashed by her daughter's enormous tongue and chewed nearly to a pulp. Hannah continually practiced mashing her mother with her tongue until she was nearly unconscious, then blowing bubbles while trying to capture her mother's tiny, chewed up body right in the middle. Once the bubble popped, Morgan would be stuck to her daughter's pale face for a moment, before Hannah would stick out her tongue and pull her mother back inside to be chewed on some more.

Hannah would usually click off the light and fall asleep with her mother still in her mouth, sucking on her between her gum and cheek, still encased in bubblegum. Every night, she was left with a warning: “UGH, MOMMY, IF YOU *EVER* TRY TO RUN AWAY WHILE I'M ASLEEP, I'LL PUT YOU IN A JAR AND PUKE IN IT! I'M SERIOUS!” Morgan wasn't sure if her daughter would actually do it, or if it was just the worst threat she could think of. Either way, for 3 days she never even got the opportunity; every morning she awoke still in her daughter's mouth.

Then, the fourth night, Morgan awoke not completely in the dark. From the light of Hannah's night light, she could see that her daughter's drool was running down onto the mattress on top of her... and she was still covered in bubblegum, although it was sort of cracked in half. As Morgan fought with the gum, it came loose! She stepped out of the drool, and looked up at her giant daughter's sleeping face in the pale darkness.

This was it! Finally, this was her chance to escape!
112221211.title: Sorry Mommy!  You Belong Under My Feet!

Morgan fights to live, tries to keep swimming as her daughter goes back to sleep
1122212111.content:
Morgan tried to climb down off the bed hoping to find her ex-husband. Unfortunately when she was halfway down the covers Hannah woke up.

Hannah was panicky for a second, she didn't want to let her slave mommy escape but soon she spotted the cowering Morgan halfway down the bed.

"Mommy, I told you waht would happen if you tried to escape, now you're going to get it!"

Morgan shrieked in despair she had been so close! "Please baby, Mommy loves you don't do this to me. Oh God please don't do this."

But Hannah was long past feeling any empathy toward her old mean mommy. She quickly got a jar and dropped the one inch tall Morgan in it. Morgan was screaming and pleading the entire time which caused Hannah just to laugh. "Silly Mommy-slave, you should of thought about that before being naughty."

Hannah stuck a finger down her throat and puked into the jar. The acidic vomit burned Morgan and she screamed in wretched agony. It was quite a bit of vomit for a young girl and the jar was rather small so it filled the jar far enough that Morgan's feet no longer touched the bottom. The combination of soup and stomach acid didn't have much solidity to it so Morgan had to actually swim to the top of the disgusting mess in order to keep breathing.

As the acid burned her skin she realized she was at the end of her rope. She didn't think she could keep swimming for long. She begged her daughter, "Please darling, please honey, please Hannah your mommy is going to die if she remains in here!"

Hannah shrugged, "You're stupid. You aren't my mommy. I don't care if you die or not, you are nothing to me."

Morgan's heart broke. Her own daughter told her she meant nothing to her. She began to sob, she had truly hit rock bottom. She was tempted just to sink beneath the vomit and end it all, why struggle when it was probably futile anyway?
1122212111.title: She tries to climb down off the bed... to go lo...

1122212112.content:
Morgan was sick of children, after having spent weeks or months under the tyrannical care of her daughter Hannah she wanted the help of an adult, someone with reason, and understanding, and most of all who was mature.
Morgan started to slowly walk towards the edge of Hannah’s bed. Each step she took was filled with fear. The fear of her daughter waking up, the last thing Morgan wanted was to be punished by Hannah again. She was unsure of how much she could really take.
A nausea set in as Morgan reached the edge of Hannah’s bed. It was further down then she realized. A defeated feeling already started to set in. She was going to spend the rest of her life a slave to her daughter. Hannah already had started to think of her mother as a possession, and less of a person. Hannah my strip away all thoughts of humanity in a few more weeks or months.
“I can’t give up now” Morgan said to herself as she once again approached the edge of the bed. That is when an Idea popped into Morgan’s head. She walked over to Hannah’s bright yellow comforter and grabbed the frayed edges. She looked down and saw the frayed edge pattern continued down all the way to the bed skirting which touched the floor.
Morgan grabbed the frayed edges and started making her way down the side of the bed. It was slow going, as every movement Hannah would make halted her process and she had to hang on for dear life. Morgan finally reached the skirting which was a quick climb down as it wasn’t effected by Hannah’s movements. As soon as Morgan touched the floor she found herself face to face with her old nemesis. It was Hannah’s purple sketchers. Morgan took a few steps back unsure of what she was feeling at first, but as she continued stepping backwards until the skirting of the bed was at her back she realized it was fear.
Morgan decided it would be best to walk alongside the skirting and give those shoes a wide berth, as even though they had zero intelligence were merely inanimate objects manipulated by her daughter, her time spent with them has left her with quite a fear she would rather not face right now.
The high carpeting of Hannah’s room made Morgan’s escape a lot slower going. She was really started to get scared as it the morning sunlight was starting to shine in and she was only halfway across Hannah’s room.
Morgan picked up her pace, as she knew time was not on her side. She had made a bit more progress when her heart skipped a beat at the sound of bed springs compressing. Morgan felt intense terror sweep through her body. She desperately looked from left to right for some place to hide. The only thing that posed any real possibility was a light blue sweater just to the left of her. Morgan looked back at Hannah’s bed and saw her daughter starting rise and took running towards sweater.
“Mommy? MOMMY where are you!” shouted Hannah which sent shivers of fear down Morgan’s spine as she crawled beneath the sweater. Hannah’s bare foot slapped slammed down onto the carpeting as Morgan watched Hannah look into her purple sketchers for Morgan, but when she wasn’t there a look of anger flashed across Hannah’s face.
Morgan gulped aloud as she watched her daughter walk about the room calling her name. Morgan buried herself deeper beneath Hannah’s sweater when she saw Hannah’s bare foot slam down inches from her. Morgan’s nose crinkled slightly as a unpleasant odor came wafting off Hannah’s foot.
“Go away, please go away” was all Morgan kept repeating. A second later bright light shone down everywhere and a thud of the sweater being tossed to the side sounded a moment later.
“There you are slave. Did you think you could escape me?” Hannah bellowed down.
“Hannah, let me explain. It’s not what you think” Morgan tried to sputter out but It was futile. She could see the anger in Hannah’s eyes. That is when the door opened. She saw Stephanie standing there.
“You aren’t ready yet? Well hurry up breakfast is getting cold” Stephanie said rather matter of factl.
“Oh god, Stephanie Help” was all Morgan managed to get out before the foot of her daughter slammed down atop of her. A wave of stench filled Morgans lungs as tears fell down her face..
“I will be down in a second mommy.” Hannah said watching her new mother leave before returning her gaze down to her old mommy.
Morgan felt Hannah’s foot lift up slightly and then pound down right beside her. She couldn’t believe how big her eight year old daughter looked. Stephanie looked even more domineering; at about one a half times the size of Hannah.
Morgan tried to back away, but Hannah’s hand engulfed her as she was lifted up into the air and held before her daughters face. Tears slid down her face as Hannah’s eyes bore a hole in her.
“Honey, let me explain, it’s not what you think. Mommy was just..”
“You aren’t my mommy. My mommy died, and new mommy is downstairs.”
The words cut through Morgan. She felt like she was shot. She was barely aware of Hannah walking over to her desk and setting her down. Morgan just laid flat on the wooden desktop next to her daughters gigantic computer. A moment later she saw a rubber band in her daughters hand. Hannah stuck two of her fingers through the inside of the rubber band and then pressed the rubber band down against her mothers bottom.
“Hannah, no! Stop! Young lady, don’t you even” was all Morgan could get out before Hannah pulled back on the rubber band and let it slap against her bottom. The pain was unlike anything Morgan had ever felt before. A second later Hannah was pulling back on the rubber band again and let it slap against her mothers behind. This happened again and again. Tears strolled down Morgan’s face as she was unable to control herself. Each thwap of the rubber band against her bottom sent pain through her entire body. When Hannah stopped, Morgan couldn’t even contain herself, the tears kept strolling down her face.
“Now are you going to disobey me again?” Hannah shouted down at her mother.
“No, I wont ever do it again.” Morgan sobbed as Hannah gave her bottom one last thwap with the rubber band.
Morgan heard a drawer open up and second later a orange scrunchie was in her daughters hand. Morgan didn’t even try to fight it as Hannah wrapped the hair try around her body. From Morgan’s chest down she was wrapped up in gigantic orange cloth of the hair tie. A second smaller elastic hair band was wrapped a few times over Morgan’s mouth.
“That should keep you in place till I get back.” Hannah said as she tossed her mother into a small a small cloth bag which held seemingly hundreds of other scrunchies of varying size. Morgan watched as Hannah pulled the drawstring shut sealing her in the bag.
“When I get back, we will continue your punishment.” Those words caused Morgan to wince as she already in a lot of pain, she couldn’t imagine what else Hannah has cooked for her. It’s like she really doesn’t view me as her mother anymore. Morgan cries as she hears Hannah close her door tightly leaving Morgan alone with her thoughts to lie in wait for her tormenting daughter to return.

1122212112121121112.content:
Heading home, Hannah was halfway through their large front yard, when she suddenly stopped in her tracks. The hyperactive girl smiled wickedly down at her shoe containing her mother, coming up with a new activity to try. Pulling off her shoes, she roughly dumped her sweat-soaked mother onto the grass in front of her feet.

"I have a new game I want to play with you," Hannah said with a smirk. "All you have to do is try to stay away, and if you can't, just try not to get hurt too much!"

Hearing that, Morgan seemed to turn pale, remembering how much Hannah had already done to her at this size. There was no way this would go well for her. Reaching down, Hannah lightly poked her tiny mother in the head, knocking her onto her butt.

"Don't worry mommy, I'll go easy on you. I'm only gonna use my feet for this game."

Morgan stood up again, and looked up at her massive daughter, who was watching her excitedly. Just waiting for her to agree, not that it would matter if she didn't.

"I guess I don't really have a choice do I?" Morgan squeaked.

"Yay! This is gonna be so much fun!" Hannah squealed, as Morgan took a step back. "Ready! Set! GO!"

As soon as she shouted go, Hannah had punted Morgan straight up into the air. The impact was incredibly painful, but she knew it was just the beginning. As she fell toward the ground below, she mistakenly took a look below. BAM! Hannah laughed loudly, as she started to play with her tiny mother like she was a hacky sack. She was really enjoying the fact that Morgan would let out a squeaky yelp every time she was kicked. Hannah enjoyed this for about ten minutes, before she missed a kick and her mother crashed into the ground. Luckily for Morgan, she wasn't too high up, so the fall was only slightly excruciating. Unluckily for her, Hannah immediately started kicking her back and forth between her feet, like she was a soccer ball.

In a surprise turn of events, Hannah kicked her a little hard, and Morgan actually managed to escape for a moment. She shakily got to her feet, and tried to hobble away. She knew she probably couldn't escape her giant daughter, but she sure as hell was going to try. A series of loud booms told her that Hannah was right behind her, not to mention her thunderous laughter. BAM! Morgan's pathetic escape attempt was cut short, as Hannah's foot crashed into her back, sending her flying. She landed face-down in the grass, feeling like she'd just been hit by a train. She felt her daughter's giant toe nudge her a couple times, then it flipped her onto her back. No sooner was she flipped over, when Hannah placed her giant sweaty foot onto her, with her head stuck between her big and second toe. Through the immense pain, Morgan looked up at her massive daughter, just to see a massive grin on her face.

"That was awesome!" Hannah shouted. "You didn't do very good though mommy, you should have tried harder. Now, what should we do next?"

11222121122.content:
Hannah went downstairs, leaving her mother to wait a painfully long time for her to return. Her mind was racing, and she knew she'd have severe bruises from the whipping her daughter had just given her. She lay there, bound, gagged, helpless, waiting for her enormous, beautiful daughter to come back and 'punish' her some more.

She started to sob.

Hannah eventually returned, but as her footsteps approached, and Morgan's heart nearly beat itself out of her chest, she slowly began to realize that her daughter wasn't planning on letting her out of her new prison right away. She heard the computer boot up.

Hannah spent hours on the computer, with her mother lying helplessly trapped in her 'hair thingy' bag. Then, when she got through with the computer, she left and took a shower. And after that, she went to bed. No punishment, no nothing. She just ignored her tiny mother, leaving her in the bag to wait.

Stephanie straightened and Morgan closed her eyes shut, tears streaming down her cheeks. Her body shook uncontrollably. She expected Stephanie's sole to slide over her, but it never came, as if Stephanie was waiting for Morgan to open her eyes--which the tiny woman did.

"You should be honored, you know. This pair of shoes is one of my favorite. I consider them my most comfortable, although I imagine they are about to get a whole lot more comfortable."

Stephanie's serene smile was like a Roman goddess standing atop the ruins of a freshly conquered city. In one dexterous movement, she lifted her leg, the foot peeking out the end of her jeans bare, the long toes wiggling. She must be a 12, Morgan thought absently, or a 1200.

Morgan thought that she was wrong once again. Watching Stephanie's colossal sole lower, she knew this would be far, far worse than when Hannah used her. Morgan considered Stephanie beautiful, she suddenly realized. She wanted to be Stephanie, but all she was about to be to this perfect woman is a little pleasurable bump against the sole of her foot.

Stephanie purposely touched her foot down toward the heel of her shoe and wiggled her toes over Morgan's leg--who noticed for the first time that the giantess's toe nails were flawlessly painted a dark shade of purple and obviously done professionally.

The molesting toes passed over, then the silky smooth, buttery soft ball of the giantess's foot started to glide over Morgan, who shivered and gritted her death. It felt good, she couldn't deny that. Stephanie obviously took great care of her feet. They actually smelled great, too, like some soft, fruity lotion. But it was humiliating. And there was no pressure, which Morgan was dreading.

All at once the foot locked into position atop her, Morgan resting just where the ball of Stephanie's foot met the arch, and then the long toes curled and held the shoe tightly to the sole of the foot, forcing Morgan up into the flesh, as Stephanie stepped off the bed. Morgan screamed, queasy with the sweeping, uncertain movements, but her mouth was forced painfully open more as Stephanie's weight settled upon her. Her whole body felt as if it would compress at any moment and she had an image in her head that she was actually spreading out under Stephanie's weight.

Stephanie, for her part, simply stood there for a moment and let her weight comfortably rest across her feet. She looked down at the shoe that Morgan was on and wiggled her toes under their leather hood. Was Morgan screaming down there? She couldn't tell, and could barely feel the tiny woman. Stephanie grinned--was she already flattened so quickly? She didn't want to take her foot out and see, after all she could only check in a few hours. The grin didn't leave her as she left the room, her shoes--and Morgan--slapping up against her long soles with each step.

Morgan was in Hell.
11222121122112111.title: Stephanie lowers Morgan toward her empty shoe.

choices: Stephanie enjoys more alone time with Morgan.
Mike comes home.
112221211221121111.content:
Stephanie walked out of her room, running her hand through her blond mess of hair and purring contentedly like a woman who had just enjoyed some really great sex. And she was really hot, she realized. The amount of power she had over Morgan, the fact that she had the one woman she hated most in the world under her foot, unnoticed by the rest of the world and now nothing but a speck atop her expensive leather insoles, the fact that Morgan's world was now the sole of Stephanie's foot--it all really turned her on. The idea that Morgan had already flattened and been killed under her foot was pleasant, but at the same time she hoped that Morgan would exhibit the same resilience she had under her own daughter's foot and remain alive for weeks to come.

As she entered the kitchen, Stephanie fixed herself a glass of juice and then walked over to the windows overlooking the back yard, watching the kids play in the distance. She let all of her weight settle on foot covering Morgan, her other propped on on a chair at the knee. She watched Hannah play. Stephanie wondered what possessed the girl to reduce her very own biological mother to a little toy she mashed under her feet for nearly a month--as brilliant as it felt. Not to mention she lied for nearly a month while torturing little Morgan! Stephanie pondered Morgan's funeral which they all went to, had Hannah had her mother under her feet then as well? Stephanie chuckled, her sole flexing as she sought out the small woman's body.

For Morgan, Stephanie's casual walk to the kitchen to get some juice was far from an easy stroll. Every muscle in her body was painfully tight, straining against the unimaginable weight of the titaness forced down on her. It was way, WAY worse than what she had been subjected to under Hannah's foot. Stephanie also added a little spring to her step that forcefully slapped her slides up against her soles, her foot smacking the entirety of Morgan's tiny, 1-inch tall frame before it crushed her into the floor mercilessly, repeatedly, forcing the air out of her in a scream that was smothered by the soft flesh of the foot above her that molded around her--just as the giantess predicted. When Stephanie finally stopped walking, Morgan wasn't given any rest as the giantess put all her weight onto her, the foot forcing Morgan hard into the soft leather insole and she absolutely felt that this was it, that she would burst. She finally found the sudden strength to fight, to squirm and trying and force the foot off of her but her body was more or less paralyzed.

Stephanie felt these struggles, however. She bit her lower lip and closed her eyes, concentrating on the tickling little movements her captive provided her. "Mm," she murmured, "heavenly."

Stephanie started walking back into the kitchen, smothering Morgan into stillness. She started to prepare an elaborate dinner for the children and her husband, feeling the sudden need to stay on her feet. Morgan found a new surprising torture from this--the smell of the food. It didn't happen at first, but as Stephanie walked around, shoes slapping against her soles, the smell of a home cooked meal wafted down to Morgan and occasionally overpowered the scent of fruity foot lotion and leather. Morgan was aware that she hadn't eaten in a week and that her lips were beyond dry. Her mind also went back to what she had to do to survive previously--lick her daughter's foot for nourishment... NO! her mind screamed, she would NOT give Stephanie that pleasure. Let me starve, she thought.

The meal was received splendidly, though Morgan couldn't tell if Mike was home or not. It sounded like just Stephanie and the kids. Once it was done, Stephanie sat around for a while, keeping her foot flat and on top of Morgan, cutting her off from the world still. The muscles of Stephanie's sole would move in subtle ways, reacting the most whenever Morgan squirmed a little bit.

"I guess I'll put dinner away until Mike comes home," Stephanie said out loud, and Morgan figured this was probably a message to her--no Mike meant more time with the giantess.
112221211221121111.title: Morgan, Stephanie's new insole.

choices: Stephanie dunks Morgan in her yogurt.
Stephanie likes the thought of Morgan licking her feet.
1122212112211211111.content:
Stephanie put all of the food away in sealed tubs and put them in the fridge, all the while humming to herself. She walked to each of the kid's room, though found them both in Hannah's--they had taken to having little "slumber parties" and would read to one another--and smiled radiantly as she kissed them both good night. Morgan, all the while, was under this angelic matron's sole, her world warming up as Stephanie's foot began to warm a bit in its shoe, and, impossibly, seeming to get softer. The smell of lotion was slowly giving way to the natural smell of Stephanie's sole, and both the leather insole and Morgan's skin were beginning to get slick with the giantess's foot sweat.

Morgan heard Matt giggle from her place in purgatory. "Momma..." Morgan's heart fluttered to a stop hearing him call Stephanie that, "you look so happy."

"Yeah," Hannah chimed in, "why all the smiles, mom?"

"Oh, you two just bring out the best in me. I love you both. What a blessing you two are." And Stephanie leaned over and kissed them both on the forehead, putting all of her weight on the ball of her foot, crushing Morgan. Stephanie and Hannah shared a secret giggle.

With a sigh, Morgan closed the door behind her and walked back toward the kitchen. Mike still wasn't home. She opened the fridge and pulled out a packet of yogurt and got a spoon, going over to the couch to sit down. She crossed her legs, keeping the shoe that Morgan was trapped in forced hard to the ground as she started eating her yogurt. She thrilled at each little squirm she managed to force out of the diminutive woman. Then she crossed her legs over again, this time keeping Morgan high in the air as Stephanie used her toes to force her insole to slap her soft sole time and time again. Stephanie could just making out Morgan's little shrieks as she was battered up against her sole.

Stephanie suddenly stopped, spoon in her mouth. She smiled around it.

Leaning forward with feline grace, Stephanie slipped the leather slide off her foot slowly, watching for Morgan's body to fall out in the dim lighting of the living room. Stephanie had a cruel, expectant smile on her face all the while, but no body ever fell. Curiously, she glanced at the sole of her foot, a tingle of excitement in her--had Morgan finally smushed? Nothing was there. Then she scanned the insole of her shoe. Morgan was looking back at her, her tiny one-inch tall form pasted to the insole which was a tad shiny from the sweat of Stephanie's foot. Morgan was absolutely BATTERED, her tiny body was thick looking as if she really had spread out a little bit, and her hair and skin was damp with Stephanie's foot sweat. Stephanie's lips drew into a cocky smirk.

"Looks like you put a dent in my favorite pair of shoes. I don't know if they'll ever feel the same without you in them."

Morgan coughed and sputtered and Stephanie chuckled as she saw a trickle of sweat drool out of the woman's mouth.

"You're a mess." Stephanie stated simply. "But get used to it. I'm happy to report that I haven't been this happy and relaxed in quite a while. I think you and my feet are going to get to know each other quite intimately."

Morgan said nothing, but her face was the picture of despair. She closed her eyes and shivered, starting to slide a little bit out of the indentation Stephanie's foot had forced her into. Stephanie let her roll down along to insole and off the heel, onto her palm. She dumped the shoe on the floor and held Morgan in one hand, the yogurt held by her other.

For a while, they simply sat there, Morgan gazing down at Stephanie's legs far below, Stephanie down at her little toy, her amused gaze unwavering. Morgan licked her lips and shivered--they tasted like Stephanie's feet. The taste was robust and salty, not necessarily revolting, but it filled her with a deep humiliation. The giantess didn't seem to notice. But she DID notice when Morgan's eyes flickered toward the tub of yogurt.

"Eh?" Stephanie shook the yogurt, watching Morgan. "I imagine you're terribly hungry by now. Did Hannah ever feed you?"

Morgan didn't answer, she seemed to shrivel into herself.

"Oooh, that's right," Stephanie purred, "you did get a bit of her meal. What'd she call it? She said you would 'taste' her feet. Sick little kitten--I think you might secretly like all of this foot business."

Morgan flashed Stephanie a fiery glance that fizzled out as quickly as it came. Her eyes lowered when confronted with the giantess's iron grin.

"Still a bit of fight left in you? That's good. It's fun breaking you. But come now, Morgan, you're making me act far meaner than I need to be. I can be kind, too, you know." Morgan glanced back at the tub of yogurt as Stephanie shook it.

"Hungry?"
1122212112211211111.title: Stephanie enjoys more alone time with Morgan.

choices: Morgan breaks down and licks Stephanie's foot.
Morgan goes back in Stephanie's shoe.
11222121122112111112.content:
Stephanie grins. "Well? Are you hungry?"

Morgan didn't want to move. Her body ached in pain and her ears buzzed. Even the giantess's whispers were hurting them. She still felt the crushing pressure of Stephanie's foot even though she was no longer under it. She tried to nod.

"Can't heeear you," Stephanie nearly sang.

"I'm hungry..." Morgan said. But Stephanie merely mocked her again. "I'm hungry, okay!" The little woman screamed.

Stephanie grinned and leaned forward, lowering Morgan down to the carpet. Morgan suddenly felt her entire body prickle with fear. "What are you doing?" She stammered. She didn't want to be close to Stephanie's feet again. She wanted some yogurt. "I said I was hungry! Please! Please Stephanie!" Stephanie started humming and drowned out her little screams.

The giantess dropped Morgan when she was still a ways from the carpet and the landing was made more painful by the tiny woman's strained joints and aching muscles. All at once she found Stephanie's foot resting on its side, it's long length and height like the side of a wide, squat building and it's distinctive scent washed over Morgan.

"Dinner is served!" Stephanie laughed, nodding her head toward her sole.

Morgan wailed and fell away from it, punching at the floor because she couldn't do anything else, because punching Stephanie's sole would only give the colossal bitch pleasure, and because there was no way of telling when the effects of the experiment would ever correct themselves.

"Hey," Stephanie cooed. "Hey, c'mon. No need for a tantrum." Morgan expected to find herself flattened under the giant foot but it's warm flesh never descended on her. "Hey, Morgan. Look."

Hearing her name used in such a gentle tone, Morgan actually looked up toward her captor. Stephanie had a slathering of yogurt on the end of her fingertip and was lowering it down toward Morgan. Morgan sat up excitedly. Real food. Her belly had only been filled with the sweat and filth from her daughter's foot, and the saliva from inside that cruel girl's mouth. Morgan had entirely forgotten what the sensation of taste really was.

"Thank you," Morgan said, rising to her feet unsteadily, testing her legs. Tears fell from her eyes. "Oh, thank you."

"See?" Stephanie said with a smile that was almost genuinely nice. "I'm not all bad. Do you want it?" Stephanie waggled her finger. "C'mon, little one, don't you want some yogurt?"

Morgan ignored being called "little one" and was jumping up at the offered finger. "Oh yes! Yes please! Very much!"

Stephanie grinned. In one smooth movement, Stephanie sat up, pulling the finger away from Morgan. Before the tiny woman could react, the giantess lifted her foot, too, and rested it on top of her other leg, crossed at the ankle. "I'm out of bowls," Stephanie said, playfully, "but this should work well enough."

When Stephanie lowered her foot, Morgan saw that a streak of yogurt trailed from Stephanie's long, second toe to the middle of her expansive arch. Stephanie couldn't help but laugh down at the woman, almost a cackle, as Morgan sank to her knees.

"Stop expecting special treatment, you dumb little bitch. It's time you started accepting your new roll in life." Stephanie started wiggling her toes, the yogurt slicking the space between her big toe and the next and shining from between the wrinkles of her sole. "C'mon, little doggy. Lick my feet. C'mon!" Her voice was incredibly demeaning. "Be a good girl and show Mommy how good you are at learning new tricks."

Morgan's mouth was fully open. She was frozen on her knees. She couldn't believe Stephanie's words.

"C'mon, pet!" Stephanie giggled, her toes still wiggling. "Lick Mommy's yummy feet!"

"I'm not your pet!" Morgan shrieked, jumping to her feet. "Fuck you! I'm not your damn pet!"

Stephanie's face went blank. She regarded Morgan coolly, the little woman shivering under the giantess's gaze, wilting under the face which hovered high in the dimly lit sky. "Yes you are." Stephanie said flatly.

"No... No..." Morgan wailed, sinking back to her knees.

Stephanie slid her foot closer. "There it is, PET. Your dinner. Take it or leave it."

Morgan didn't move. She slumped over. Stephanie calling her pet brought back the harsh needles of humiliation which pierced her when her own daughter, Hannah, called her a slave.

"Well?" Stephanie asked. When the woman still didn't move, she tsked. "Fine, pet. No food for you tonight."

The giantess leaned over, napkin in hand. Morgan couldn't stop the despaired wail which escaped her gaping mouth. With one smooth swipe, Stephanie cleaned the majority of yogurt from her sole, thought a few little glistening specks still remained. She then slid her other foot, the one without yogurt, into her shoe.

"No!" Morgan screamed, realizing she was about to go back to being an insole. But before she could say anything she was painfully knocked over. Stephanie had bapped her with a tree-like finger.

"Yes, pet. You were very bad tonight."

Morgan watched in panic as Stephanie retrieved her other shoe. Beside her, Stephanie's foot was still resting there, little specks of yogurt shining like jewels against her giant sole.
11222121122112111112.title: Humiliation-flavored yogurt

choices: Hannah is having trouble sleeping.
Mike's finally home.
112221211221121111121.content:
Just as Stephanie's foot began to rise, Morgan couldn't control herself--before she knew it she was sprinting toward the sole and she knew exactly what she was about to do. The thought didn't even disgust her. Here was food. That was all she thought. Morgan felt the giantess gazing down at her with interest, and the foot lowered back onto its side, sinking into the carpet.

Morgan attacked the nearest nugget of yogurt with her tongue, gulping it down with zeal, suddenly ravished beyond imagination. The flavor of peach nearly exploded in her mouth and she felt her brain tingle as she once again remembered what peach tasted like.

"Good girl," Stephanie cooed from on high.

Morgan slurped at the blobs of yogurt, drinking them in greedily. There weren't many, however, and she soon ran out. But her stomached ACHED in a way she didn't think was possible. The flavor almost hurt with how rich it was, and her shriveled stomach already felt heavy, but her brain was overridden by the wants of the body and Morgan found herself lapping at wherever there was even a hint of yogurt left.

"Mmm, good pet." Stephanie said with a sigh. "Lick Mommy's foot."

Morgan felt rejuvenated and left wet streaks across Stephanie's sole, which were more or less dry but still tasted of sweat. She even barely heard Stephanie's demeaning remarks. Morgan blushed, though, when she realized the taste of peach was gone and now she was just tasting the unique flavor of Stephanie's foot. She blushed even deeper when she realized it didn't repulse her tongue. Her body wanted more, even if it was Stephanie's sweat.

"Want some more, little one?" Stephanie offered. She was leaning over, her eyes and smile wider than Morgan'd ever seen. "You're being very, VERY good."

Morgan felt herself tingle a little bit at the sudden praise. It'd been so long since she felt wanted. Hannah made her feel like she was nothing but filth under her sole, but here Stephanie was actually acknowledging her as something, even if that something was a pet for Stephanie's amusement.

Morgan took an unconscious step toward Stephanie's foot and had to remind herself that the giantess's sole had no more yogurt on it. "Y-yes, please..."

"Do you like licking Mommy's foot?" Stephanie was already raising her foot away, yogurt on her fingertip.

'Yes, y-yes I do."

"You do... What?" Stephanie fished, as if teaching a student a grammar lesson. She slathered the yogurt along the underside of her toes and wiggled them so yogurt got between the long appendages.

"I like," Morgan swallowed and nearly choked, "I like licking your foot."

Stephanie was already beaming, her foot lowering back down. Morgan stared hungrily at the yogurt covering the giant toes. But the foot stopped just out of reach. "Whose foot?"

"Your foot," Morgan offered.

Stephanie frowned, but only slightly, and wiggled her toes. Morgan knew what she wanted to hear but she didn't want to say it. Half of her felt like it had already given up. The other half of her was still aware that she was spiraling down into a place she might never be able to get out of--a place where she isn't a human at all, but very little Stephanie's little foot pet. Her hatred of Stephanie still lingered in the dim corners of her mind, but it was clouded by hunger and a perverted want to be accepted by this beautiful, perfect goddess, this all-powerful woman.

"Your foot, Mommy." Morgan finally said.

"Good pet." And the foot was lowered.

Morgan fell upon the toes immediately, and Stephanie laughed as the tiny woman cleaned the tips of her toes with her tongue. Morgan didn't stop there, not missing a beat when Stephanie raised her toes, letting the tiny woman lapped at their undersides. "You're such a good little pet," Stephanie cooed. Morgan nearly melted at the praise. She didn't protest when Stephanie's long toes slid around her head and curled over her shoulders, forcing her down onto her knees. Morgan's tongue licked up the yogurt and sweat between Stephanie's toes, and she oddly fond herself torn between which flavor she liked more. When she licked Stephanie's naked flesh after all the yogurt was gone, the giantess would purr and giggle and it made Morgan feel good.

Before Morgan realized it, all of the yogurt was gone and she was simply licking between and at the inside of Stephanie's long, elegant toes. She looked up and noticed the giantess looking down at her with a girlish grin on her face and couldn't help but think Stephanie was beautiful. And with that smile, she looked so much younger. And Morgan was the one to thank for that smile--which filled her with a perverted sense of pride.

"I'll have to thank Hannah for breaking you in for me, pet. We've made a lot of progress tonight. Time to head back to bed."

Morgan shuddered as a leather slide was dropped down next to her.

"Hop on," the giantess commanded, though in a friendly way.

"I..." Morgan hesitated. She pictured herself on her back on the shoe and all that crushing weight on top of her. "I... Please... I can't."

"I'll be gentle." Stephanie offered. She pinched Morgan between her thumb and forefinger and raised the tiny woman to her beautiful face. Morgan found that she was shivering, but not from fear. "Don't get to thinking that you don't belong under my foot. That's your place in life. You're actions will determine whether you're my pet or my bitch--it's up to you. But either way you're pathetic, little one. You should feel honored that I bother to keep you under my sole."

Morgan felt a heat rise inside her at the giantess's words, but also something disturbing. Her anger was forced down by another voice, a new feeling. Part of her really WAS honored that Stephanie was taking the time to break her. After all, nothing was stopping her from popping Morgan like a grape between her fingers.

She was lowered to the insole and into the indentation her body had made earlier. With one last powerful, condescending smile down at her, Stephanie's vast sole replaced the sky and settled. The heat of the sole felt good, and the smell of Stephanie's foot was oddly comforting despite how much Morgan didn't want it to be. Despite the promise of being gentle, Morgan was horribly crushed down as the giantess stood and pain flared up anew all over. Stephanie walked naturally toward her room and didn't seem to try to do anything to alleviate Morgan's suffering--though she didn't actively seek to increase it, either. The sick little voice deep inside Morgan was oddly grateful.

Stephanie didn't take off her slides as she went through her nightly routine. Taking off her makeup, brushing her teeth. Finally, she removed then and started to unzip her pants. "I can't trust you to stay yet," the towering blond said, almost sadly. Morgan desperately wanted to prove to her giantess that she could. But Stephanie pinched her and Morgan found herself trapped against the middle of Stephanie's chest once more as the titaness undressed. Her boobs bulged together with her movements and made Morgan feel warm and dizzy.

Stephanie changed into a robe, put on some slippers, and walked toward her bed. She propped some pillows up and sat down, pulling a book from her nightstand to read. Morgan was trapped for what seemed like an hour, forced to hear the powerful beats of the giantess's heart--which was bigger by far than the tiny woman--and shivered each time Stephanie absently pet her with a finger and cooed praises down at her for her fine performance earlier. Morgan's stomach was starting to settle as well as shame. She felt some of her fight coming back but thought it best to save it. Still, part of her wanted to be back at Stephanie's feet--back at their warmth, their comforting smell, their taste. Being Stephanie's pet wasn't anything like being Hannah's slave. It was more dangerous. It was something that had rewards the more she humiliated herself before the goddess. It was something she almost wanted.

Both of them perked up at the sudden sound of footsteps in the hallway, and the twist of the bedroom doorknob.
112221211221121111121.title: Morgan breaks down and licks Stephanie's foot.

choices: In a pile of clothes on the ground
Somewhere else
112221211221121112.content:
Morgan felt the incredible weight of Stephanie compress her body into the towering woman's shoe with each step she took. Morgan groaned out loudly as her body felt the pain, but she knew by now, after weeks of being subject to the same kind of torture by her own daughter, that no one could hear her scream.

As Stephanie walked downstairs, the sole of her shoe would slap against her heel, pummelling Morgan in the process. The tiny woman was stuck to the bottom of her tormentor's foot, forced to take whatever punishment her shoe would dish out.

Morgan could feel her bruised and battered body tighten with each step, as every muscle strained to withstand the torture of having tons of pressure being applied to it every other second or so. Morgan felt that at any moment, her body would simply burst, leaving a bloody mess on the bottom of Stephanie's shoe.

Then, the worst thing imaginable happened: the dizziness returned, a signal that the after effects of her experiment weren't over yet. She could feel her body begin shrinking again, as the foot she was stuck to spread out in all directions. The pressure the foot caused also increased, as Morgan's overall body mass became less and less.

Morgan was desperate. She knew she couldn't stay where she was. But because of her current location, trapped underneath the foot of an unmerciful titaness, she couldn't really move an inch. Not to mention the fact that her shrinking was continuing with each passing second. Just how small would she become?

The thought of having Stephanie discover her even smaller terrified Morgan to her very core. She could NOT afford to let that happen to her.

Pulling desperately for a few seconds, Morgan actually managed to free both of her arms, despite the great pain she was now in. Looking at the bruised and purple-hued extremities, Morgan was reminded of all of the torture she had went through in the past several weeks. The malnourishment she had endured. The fact that she was several pounds lighter than she was before. It had to stop. And it had to stop now.

The shrinking woman was hoping to use momentum to her advantage. Morgan waited until the massive shoe came towards her again. She braced her body for impact, and felt as she was compressed once more into the leathery surface. Then, as it lifted off of her, Morgan grasped desperately at whatever she could get her hands on.

In one swift motion, the tiny woman was extracted from Stephanie's massive sole, dangling several hundred feet off the ground. At the most opportune moment, as the foot was just about at its highest point, Morgan let go and went sailing through the air, helpless as to where she would end up.

So...where DOES Morgan end up?
112221211221121112.title: Shrinking Once More

choices: Stephanie, furious that Morgan had escaped
Matt, her son
1122212112211211121.content:
Morgan's frail body went sailing through the air, not knowing where she would end up. She hoped it was somewhere soft, like pillow or a couch cushion, so that she could somehow escape the house and get someone to help her.

And another part of her wished she would just smash against a wall, her body exploding upon impact, sending blood and internal organs flying, so she's be spared from any more torture her family might decide to inflict on her.

Fortunately, it was the former, as Morgan came crashing down on a pile of her son's dirty clothes. Morgan felt her dizziness stop as the smelly shirt she was lying on collapsed in around her, filling her nostrils with the putrid smell of her son's sweaty garments.

She didn't know ho small she was now and she didn't care; all she cared about was getting as fa away from Hannah and Stephanie as she possibly could.

Morgan tried to stand up, but because she had gone without any real food for weeks her body was very frail now. She managed to take a few steps, before teetering back and forth on her weakened legs. She eventually collapsed, falling backwards, her tiny, and for the record, half-inch-tall body, sliding down the mountainous pile of clothes, before settling near the cuff of her son's pants.

************

Several hours have passed. Morgan was surrounded in near darkness. She guessed it was probably close to midnight or so by now. She raised up on her weakened legs, the stick-thin extremities shaking as she did so. Morgan managed to slide down the rest of the pile of clothes and land on the floor. A small lamp burned above her on a small table, giving her the ability to walk around without stumbling blindly in the dark.

She walked around towards the front of the pile to survey just where exactly she was, her body aching as she moved. It seemed the shrunken woman was in the dining room, since a set of chairs and a massive table rose before her like a series of skyscrapers.

Morgan spotted something on the ground about 100 feet away. She limped towards it, wondering what it was. As she got halfway there, she discovered it was a tiny crumb from someone's sandwich. She didn't know how long it had laid there; all she knew was that it was real food, something she had been without for a long time.

Morgan ran as fast as she could the rest of the way, ignoring her sore legs as she ran. The tiny woman approached the crumb and stopped. The piece of bread was nearly as tall as she was. She dove head first into the stale bread, happy to get any nourishment inside her body.

Morgan sat on the ground, greedily devouring as much as her stomach could hold. When she was satisfied, she leaned back against the remainder of the bread, her head resting against the hard surface.

Morgan laid there for quite a long time, pleased that there wasn't anyone around to torture her or starve her for days on end. No, this was the most peaceful she had felt in weeks.

A few minutes later, the peace was broken by a distant thudding coming from upstairs. Morgan began to panic, as the footsteps started to descend the stairs.

The tiny woman ran as fast as she could to safety, but the pile of clothes she had laid on hours earlier were far away. Morgan stopped, trying to figure out where she could go. The footsteps were getting closer; she could feel the vibrations in the next room.

In a panic, she started running towards the clothes again, but knowing she would never make it in time.

A few moments later, the overhead light flicked on and Morgan froze in her tracks. She looked up and saw that the person had spotted her. The person was...

1122212112211221.content:
"Let's make a deal." Morgan said.

Stephanie pulls her out to tell her about her deal. info.brief_description: A woman is shrunk and ends up at the mercy of her kids, and her ex-husband's new family.
info.description:
Morgan is a single mother, whose husband divorced her for another woman shortly after her daughter was born. She was given joint custody of her two children, and her husband somehow got off without having to pay child support. Her husband and his new wife are allowed to have the children every other weekend, and holidays and the summer are split. The most hurtful part of her situation is that the children actually like their stepmom, sometimes saying they like her more.

Morgan can barely make enough money to pay her bills, and needs a way to make some extra money. One day, while reading the newspaper she finds an ad that catches her eye. It is asking for a female volunteer to come to a local laboratory for an experiment. She isn't really interested, until she sees that it pays $5,000, plus further payment on subsequent appointments. So, she writes down the address and decides to go try the experiment.


Characters:

Morgan - Mother/Main Character - 35 years old, dark brown hair, blue eyes, slightly below average height, and a slim figure.
